title: HOUR 2- Chip Kelly and Kyle Brandt 081320
itunes:title: HOUR 2- Chip Kelly and Kyle Brandt 081320
description:
Chip Kelly talks to Dan about how he was informed about the season being postponed. Coach Chip does not sound optimistic about playing football in the spring. Kyle Brandt tells Dan that his comment about the media rooting against the NFL has a little nugget of truth to it. Kyle says he did not mean to offend anyone particular in the media, but says he did not take the tweet down.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
